name: Pirate Cat (natsurialice)
description:
Pirate cat is a crew of White Pearl! The White Pearl is sailing back from horizon with tons of mysterious golden cheese! However, a huge amount of private mice sneaking on the White Pearl and want to eat those mysterious golden cheeses. Fluff cat needs to take care of the food storage on the pirate ship or everyone on the ship will starve to death!

This game was concepted and created in 5 weeks by a small and dedicated team of student devs at the School of Game Development @ Academy of Art University.
